programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: The contestants pair up to create the perfect French dish for acclaimed chefs Joël Robuchon, Daniel Boulud, Hubert Keller, Laurent Tourondel and Jean Joho.

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: The contestants cook with cactus, sleep under the stars, and prepare a menu for Las Vegas cowboys; chef Tim Love serves as a guest judge.

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: The contestants deconstruct a classic dish for magicians Penn & Teller; chef Michelle Bernstein serves as a guest judge.

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: A slot machine determines the guidelines for the quick-fire challenge; the contestants prepare a special dinner for members of the Macy's Culinary Council.

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: The chefs host a "Pig and Pinot" event at guest judge Charlie Palmer's Aureole restaurant.

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: The contestants take over chef Rick Moonen's restaurant while he serves as their guest judge.

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: Contestants visit Craft Steak in Las Vegas to cook for actress Natalie Portman and friends.

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: The chefs must make the perfect breakfast in bed dish; Nigella Lawson serves as guest judge.

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: A challenge based on the Bocuse d'Or; guest judges include Jerome Bocuse and Thomas Keller.

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: The final four chefs compete in Napa Valley to determine who will be the final three.

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: The final three chefs attempt to earn the title of "Top Chef."

programme.title: Top Chef
programme.desc: A candid gathering of season four's chefs and judges.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: A young grad student goes up against a veteran writer with the help of "Top Chef" All-Stars Richard Blais and Melissa King.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: A pharmacist and a pharmaceutical sales rep must identify the flavors in a variety of radishes and work with "Top Chef" alums Kwame Onuwachi and Shirley Chung.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: Two "Top Chef" superfans dig deep to make unique shellfish dishes with help from alums Melissa King and Gregory Gourdet.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: A residential architect and an actor must cook, along with Richard Blais and Joe Flamm, and create delicious dishes using a unique variety of eggs.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: "Top Chef" alums Gregory Gourdet and Isaac Toups help a vegan chef and a former CIA agent get creative when cooking for the judges in this challenge voted on by fans.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: Opposites attract when two amateur chefs work with "Top Chef" alums Joe Flamm and Tiffany Derry to match flavor profiles and make a cohesive dish.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: Things start to melt when the kitchen really heats up, and a designer goes up against a dental hygienist turned food blogger to create two dishes using chocolate.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: Two amateur chefs have to identify ingredients in a blind taste test and then use them to create a scrumptious dish.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: A lunch lady and a home sales consultant must fillet fish against the clock and cook it perfectly.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: Two amateur chefs work with "Top Chef" alums Eric Adjepong and Stephanie Cmar to reimagine the flavors of a classic comfort food.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: Two amateur chefs must butcher and cook from an entire side of beef with the help of "Top Chef" alums Tiffany Derry and Jen Carroll.

programme.title: Top Chef Amateurs
programme.desc: A psychologist and a visual merchandiser work with "Top Chef" alums Isaac Toups and Stephanie Cmar in a race to break down and claim their ingredients.

programme.title: Top Chef Duels
programme.desc: Marcel challenges Richard to make a hot and cold dessert; Richard challenges Marcel to make a burger.

programme.title: Top Chef Duels
programme.desc: Redemption for LA Chef Brooke Williamson and Las Vegas restaurant consultant Shirley Chung.

programme.title: Top Chef Duels
programme.desc: DC Restaurateur Mike Isabella and LA Restaurateur Antonia Lofaso duel.

programme.title: Top Chef Duels
programme.desc: Stefan challenges CJ to cook with smoke; backsides of animals; a foraging-themed meal.

programme.title: Top Chef Duels
programme.desc: Takashi challenges David to cook with eggs; crab to be prepared three ways.

programme.title: Top Chef Duels
programme.desc: Dale challenges Tiffani to prepare dim sum which is not her strength; Tiffany counters with an American canapé and classic cocktail contest; guest judges Rob Zombie, Scott Ian and Gary Holt.

programme.title: Top Chef Duels
programme.desc: Jen tests Nyesha on preparing sea urchin; Nyesha challenges Jen to master bacon and eggs; duel for cast of "Brooklyn Nine-Nine".

programme.title: Top Chef Duels
programme.desc: Stephanie challenges Kristen to prepare a Thai dish, while Kristen pushes Stephanie to make an upscale pasta dish; the chefs lock horns in a showdown with a Garden-of-Eden theme.

programme.title: Top Chef Duels
programme.desc: Kevin Gillespie challenges Art Smith to butcher a pig and prepare a pork dish, while Art throws down the gauntlet with a critter fry; the cast of "Grey's Anatomy" sits down for dinner.

programme.title: Top Chef Duels
programme.desc: Ten chefs must prepare dishes that appear black on the plate; the top two chefs move on to the final duel, while the remaining eight make dishes composed of all-white ingredients; in the end, one chef will win the cash prize and a magazine feature.

programme.title: Top Chef: Just Desserts
programme.desc: Pastry chefs try to impress guest judge Jacques Torres.

programme.title: Top Chef: Just Desserts
